pullrequest.title: Move haptix from beginner to advanced category

content.raw: It's interesting because we tried to make the Haptix tutorials easily accessible for non-Gazebo users ("beginners"), but the use case is very specific to the Haptix teams. The level of skill needed is high, but it's a different set of skills than what the other Gazebo tutorials develop. Hmm...
content.html: It's interesting because we tried to make the Haptix tutorials easily accessible for non-Gazebo users ("beginners"), but the use case is very specific to the Haptix teams. The level of skill needed is high, but it's a different set of skills than what the other Gazebo tutorials develop. Hmm...
